events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not as described and I would like to request a refund. The product does not meet my expectations and I want to return it as soon as possible.
The reported issue was reviewed and categorized under the Refund cluster because the customer requests money back for an unsatisfactory product.
The support case was assigned to agent Sarah Johnson to handle the refund request for the customer.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you'd like a refund for your recent order. I’m here to assist you with this process.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item has been opened or used? This will help us process your refund more efficiently.
Thank you for your quick response. The order number is 78345612, and I have not opened or used the product. It’s still in its original packaging.
We have reviewed your information and approved your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label we will email to you shortly to send the item back.
Thanks for approving my refund and making the return process easy. I will ship the item back immediately using the label provided.
We have received your returned item and processed your refund. The money should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Hello again! Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and to make sure everything is satisfactory on your end.
As we have not heard back, we are closing your case. Please contact us if you need any further assistance. Thank you for your patience.
